name: Kill! Kill!!
description:
Kill! Kill!! is an endless side-scrolling survival game. You play as a death god and your aim is to survive for as long as possible while killing waves of enemies. Each completed wave will give you a chance to pick one powerup from the three choices  available.

Controls:

a, d - Move left and right

w - Jump

k - Attack

l - Throw Dagger

*Made with pygame.  My first game.
